程序包 weka.filters
的使用

  • 使用weka.filters的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    weka.associations  
    weka.attributeSelection  
    weka.classifiers.bayes  
    weka.classifiers.functions  
    weka.classifiers.meta  
    weka.clusterers  
    weka.filters  
    weka.filters.supervised.attribute  
    weka.filters.supervised.instance  
    weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute  
    weka.filters.unsupervised.instance  
  • weka.associations使用的weka.filters中的类 
    类和说明
    Filter
    An abstract class for instance filters: objects that take instances as input, carry out some transformation on the instance and then output the instance.
  • weka.attributeSelection使用的weka.filters中的类 
    类和说明
    Filter
    An abstract class for instance filters: objects that take instances as input, carry out some transformation on the instance and then output the instance.
  • weka.classifiers.bayes使用的weka.filters中的类 
    类和说明
    Filter
    An abstract class for instance filters: objects that take instances as input, carry out some transformation on the instance and then output the instance.
  • weka.classifiers.functions使用的weka.filters中的类 
    类和说明
    Filter
    An abstract class for instance filters: objects that take instances as input, carry out some transformation on the instance and then output the instance.
  • weka.classifiers.meta使用的weka.filters中的类 
    类和说明
    Filter
    An abstract class for instance filters: objects that take instances as input, carry out some transformation on the instance and then output the instance.
  • weka.clusterers使用的weka.filters中的类 
    类和说明
    Filter
    An abstract class for instance filters: objects that take instances as input, carry out some transformation on the instance and then output the instance.
  • weka.filters使用的weka.filters中的类 
    类和说明
    Filter
    An abstract class for instance filters: objects that take instances as input, carry out some transformation on the instance and then output the instance.
    SimpleFilter
    This filter contains common behavior of the SimpleBatchFilter and the SimpleStreamFilter.
    SimpleStreamFilter
    This filter is a superclass for simple stream filters.
    Sourcable
    Interface for filters that can be converted to Java source.
    StreamableFilter
    Interface for filters can work with a stream of instances.
  • weka.filters.supervised.attribute使用的weka.filters中的类 
    类和说明
    Filter
    An abstract class for instance filters: objects that take instances as input, carry out some transformation on the instance and then output the instance.
    SimpleBatchFilter
    This filter is a superclass for simple batch filters.
    SimpleFilter
    This filter contains common behavior of the SimpleBatchFilter and the SimpleStreamFilter.
    SupervisedFilter
    Interface for filters that make use of a class attribute.
  • weka.filters.supervised.instance使用的weka.filters中的类 
    类和说明
    Filter
    An abstract class for instance filters: objects that take instances as input, carry out some transformation on the instance and then output the instance.
    SupervisedFilter
    Interface for filters that make use of a class attribute.
  • weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute使用的weka.filters中的类 
    类和说明
    Filter
    An abstract class for instance filters: objects that take instances as input, carry out some transformation on the instance and then output the instance.
    SimpleBatchFilter
    This filter is a superclass for simple batch filters.
    SimpleFilter
    This filter contains common behavior of the SimpleBatchFilter and the SimpleStreamFilter.
    SimpleStreamFilter
    This filter is a superclass for simple stream filters.
    Sourcable
    Interface for filters that can be converted to Java source.
    StreamableFilter
    Interface for filters can work with a stream of instances.
    UnsupervisedFilter
    Interface for filters that do not need a class attribute.
  • weka.filters.unsupervised.instance使用的weka.filters中的类 
    类和说明
    Filter
    An abstract class for instance filters: objects that take instances as input, carry out some transformation on the instance and then output the instance.
    SimpleBatchFilter
    This filter is a superclass for simple batch filters.
    SimpleFilter
    This filter contains common behavior of the SimpleBatchFilter and the SimpleStreamFilter.
    StreamableFilter
    Interface for filters can work with a stream of instances.
    UnsupervisedFilter
    Interface for filters that do not need a class attribute.
